answerText: 2666[10] This author of 2666 also wrote The Savage Detectives, in which Arturo Belano and Ulises Lima search for Cesárea Tinajero.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Haverford and Michigan State B | 3 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The first section of this novel features a group of critics who are searching for the author Benno von Archimboldi in Santa Teresa. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in five books, which, in its last book, reveals that Archimboldi is actually Hans Reiter.
